title: Reading Genius 2.0 (Portable)
description:

Are there things you want to learn and know more about but the task of reading simply takes too long?

Are you tired of old speedreading systems that require weeks of practice and produce dubious results?

Would you like to take advantage of all the latest breakthroughs in learning research, methods that show you how to use more of your natural brain power and that use methods previously reserved for top athletes actors and even astronauts?

Well read on because you are going to learn how you can:

* Make More Money
* Have a better Love Life
* A more Secure Future
* Advance your Career
* Help and Inspire Others
* And anything else you want to do, you can do it better

Why?
Very Simple.

This world is full of knowledge on how to achieve all of these things.

People with the same challenges, aspirations, goals and problems that you have, have already solved these problems and the solutions are written about in books.

The Challenge:
Finding the time to read those books and remember what they say.

Well now there is good news. Reading Genius(R) 2.0 guarantees you 200% increase on how well you read or your money back!

Students tested at the US Air Force Academy improved over 550% !!

And why is Reading Genius(R) 2.0 better and far more advanced than speedreading?
